author.persName: Jamal ud-Din 'Ata Allah ben Fadl Allah (known as Jamal, al-Husayni al-Shirazi).

msItem.title: Raudat al-Ahbab fi Siyar al-Nabi wa'l-Al wa-'l-Ashab / Written at the request of the Timurid minister Mir 'Ali Shir Nawa'i.
msItem.note: Inside front cover: In pencil: Morley's catalogue numbers. Flyleaf, recto: In ink: 72; title in English and Arabic; 'Presented by Sir J Malcolm May 19 1827; In pencil: title and description. Flyleaf, verso: no: 15 I.? L Folio 1, recto: a) Note of purchase for? the library of Muhammad Hafeez b, Shaikh Hamid 'Uthmani for 130 rupees on 1 Sha'ban, year one of Rafi' al-Darajat. With curse on anyone claiming ownership. Accompanied by small oval seal, presumably of the said Hafeez: Ya Hafiz Ya Hafeez 1126, regnal year probably 3. b) Partly effaced note of purchase dated 21 Ramazan (mis-spelt), regnal year one. c) Effaced note with seal. A History of the life and actions of Muhammad, his companions and their disciples. This manuscript contains only the first of the three maqsads or divisions of the book. End of scribe's name in damaged colophon: ... Muhammad walad Isma'il Musawi. Illuminated initial opening. Ruled margins. Rubricated headings and punctuation. Occasional marginal notes.
msItem.incipit: Al-hamdu lillah alladhi manna 'ala al-mu'minin idh ba'atha fihum rasulan minhum

listBibl.bibl: For Malcolm's gift see the Donations Register for 19 May 1827 and the Transactions for 1830, pp. xcix-c.

condition.p: Damaged by worm and white ants, seriously towards the end.

origin.p: Bijapur (colophon). 2 Rabi' 2, rest of date destroyed by insect .

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
